mapper.select: SELECT SMS_CODE, SMS_CONTENT, IS_COUPON_NAME, SMS_NAME, IS_PRODUCT_NAME, IS_PRODUCT_URL, REMARK, USER_VALUE, LIFE_CYCLE, PATH_ACTIVE FROM UO_OP_SMS_TEMPLATE order by SMS_CODE::integer desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UO_OP_SMS_TEMPLATE(SMS_CONTENT, IS_COUPON_URL, IS_COUPON_NAME, SMS_NAME, IS_PRODUCT_NAME, IS_PRODUCT_URL, REMARK, USER_VALUE, LIFE_CYCLE, PATH_ACTIVE) VALUES(#{smsContent},#{isCouponUrl},#{isCouponName}, #{smsName}, #{isProductName}, #{isProductUrl}, #{remark}, #{userValue}, #{lifeCycle}, #{pathActive})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UO_OP_DAILY_TEMPLATE_CONFIG WHERE SMS_CODE=#{smsCode}

select string_agg(t2.user_value, ',' order by t1.sms_code) user_value, string_agg(t2.path_active, ',' order by t1.sms_code) path_active, string_agg(t2.lifecyle, ',' order by t1.sms_code) lifecyle, t1.sms_code from uo_op_sms_template t1, uo_op_daily_template_config t2 where t1.sms_code = t2.sms_code group by t1.sms_code
